titleStmt.title: Dr. Hewit's Letter to Dr Wilde on Monday, June 7. 1658. being the day before he suffered death, and read by Dr. Wilde at his funerall.
titleStmt.author: Hewit, John, 1614-1658.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: Tower, June 7. 1658. Morning 7 a clock. Your most affectionate friend, brother and servant in Christ Jesus, John Hewit.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
